Class PHPGrid 

PHPGrid

Classes extended from PHPGrid:

Located in File: Program_Root/phpgrid.php

PHPGrid - A complete grid solution for PHP 
This class is represents a grid tied to a database table and shows a navigator to perform
the most common management operations.
  • Package - PHPGrid
  • Version - 0.1
  • Author - José León Serna <jose.leon@securitydata.es>

Method Detail

constructor PHPGrid

void constructor PHPGrid ( $host, $user, $password, $database, $table )

Class constructor 
Creates the object an stores the connection information
Function Parameters:
- string $host: Database host
- string $user: Database user
- string $password: Database password
- string $database: Database to connect
- string $table: Table to manage
Function Info:

allowedto

boolean allowedto ( $action )

Check if an action is allowed 
This functions search in the $allowedactions array for $action and returns true if it's 1
Function Parameters:
- string $action: Action to check
Function Info:

void connect ( )

Connect to the database 
This function connects to the database and stored the connection on $conn
Function Parameters:

void delete ( )

Performs a delete operation
Function Parameters:
Function Info:

editorinsert

void editorinsert ( $field, $value )

Edits or inserts a record 
This function checks if a record exists, if exists performs an edit operation and if not performs an insert operation
Function Parameters:
- string $field: Field name
- string $value: Value of the field
Function Info:

void emptytable ( )

ExecSQL

object ExecSQL ( $sql )

Executes a query 
Executes a query, manage errors and returns a recordset to work on
Function Parameters:
- string $sql: SQL to execute
Function Info:

filterquery

string filterquery ( $sql )

Filters a query 
Here, a query is modified to add more information about order and specific records
Function Parameters:
- string $sql: SQL to filter
Function Info:

getControl

string getControl ( $fieldobject, $rs, [$value = ''] )

Returns the control to edit a field 
This functions performs all the operations to get the right control to edit a field object
Function Parameters:
- object $fieldobject: Field object to edit
- object $rs: Recordset where the field object belongs
- string $value: Current field value
Function Info:

getFields

array getFields ( )

Gets all the field objects for the table 
This returns an array containing all the field objects for the table
Function Parameters:
Function Info:

getfieldsvalues

array getfieldsvalues ( $field, $value )

Get field values 
Selects a record and returns an array with field=>value
Function Parameters:
- string $field: Field name
- string $value: Value of the field
Function Info:

getFieldValue

string getFieldValue ( $field, $value )

Returns the value for a field 
Depending on the field's datatype, it formats the value or calls a custom function to get the value
Function Parameters:
- object $field: The field object
- mixed $value: Value for the field
Function Info:

getLabel

string getLabel ( $fieldobject )

To get the label of a field 
Returns a label for a field if is set in the labels array, if not returns the field name
Function Parameters:
- object $fieldobject: Field object to get the label
Function Info:

getTableCombo

string getTableCombo ( $masterfield, $detailtable, $lookupfield, $displayfield, [$selected = ''] )

Returns a combobox with the contents of a table 
This functions creates a combobox with the contents of a table, showing a field and storing as values another field
Function Parameters:
- string $masterfield: Name of the combobox to be created
- string $detailtable: Table to show
- string $lookupfield: Field containing the values
- string $displayfield: Field to show on the combo
- string $selected: To set an item as selected
Function Info:

grid

void grid ( $rs, [$currentrecord = 0], [$fullrs = true], [$forprint = false] )

Creates a grid from a recordset 
This function perform all is needed to show the grid
Function Parameters:
- object $rs: Recordset
- integer $currentrecord: First record of the recordset to show
- boolean $fullrs: If true, no pagination is generated
Function Info:

gridRow

void gridRow ( $row, $rownum, $rcolors, [$forprint = false] )

Output a row of the grid
Function Parameters:
- array $row: The row contents
- integer $rownum: Number of the row
- array $rcolors: Colors of each cell

void insertJavaScript ( )

Insert required JavaScript code

void insertrecord ( $fields )

Insert a new record in the table 
This function takes an array(field=>value) and performs an insert into operation
Function Parameters:
- array $fields: Field and values array
Function Info:

lookup

void lookup ( )

Filters a record set 
This function get field values from the $_POST array and filters the table by those values
Function Parameters:
Function Info:

recordexists

boolean recordexists ( $field, $value )

Checks if a record exists 
This function is useful to know if a record exists in the table
Function Parameters:
- string $field: Field name
- string $value: Value of the field
Function Info:

run

void run ( )

Main method 
This function manages all the operations for the grid, in normal conditions you don't need to call another method
Function Parameters:
Function Info:

SelectLimit

object SelectLimit ( $sql, $start, $recs )

Executes a query with limit 
Executes a query with limit, manage errors and returns a recordset to work on
Function Parameters:
- string $sql: SQL to execute
- integer $start: First record
- integer $recs: How many records
Function Info:

showForm

void showForm ( [$record = -1] )

This function shows a form to edit/insert a record
Function Parameters:
- integer $record: if specified, allows to edit the record contents

void showGrid ( $operation )

Shows the grid
